resources.string:

 14. Grow your network

 19. And within few month will be number one in World

30. Click To Join :

Tips for problems coming in challenge:

 1. After clicking on install if you are not redirecting to play store application then follow following steps: Try to set chrome as default browser Please reset your app preferences from phone setting/apps/application manager/reset app preference/reset app 

 2. After clicking on install if browser not support problem coming then- Try to set chrome as Default Browser. Please reset your app preferences from phone setting/apps/application manager/reset app preference/reset app 

 3. In play store Device Not compatible problem- If this problem comes then please email us your ref Id at support@greatcash.com 

 4. In play store Apps are not downloading Internet not working There is low internal space in your phone Downloading speed is very low.
